item.description:
Hello,

A bunch of us are training for marathons this autumn and this seemed like a good day to be doing our 20 milers. Often forget how fortunate we are to have the Boston Marathon course in our backyards so we're planning on running 20 miles of it back into TMIRCE and the big party that Andy is planning. Here's the route - http://tiny.cc/inform...

We didn't fancy making it an out and back so we'll take the Commuter Rail out there as follows...

(7.40 am at South Station)
7.46 am at Back Bay Station
8.30 am at Framingham Station
http://www.mbta.com/s...

There are 10 mile options too...
1. Join us for the first 10 miles and then take the T back from Woodlands at the bottom of the Newton Hills
2. Run the last 10 miles by taking the D line (green) out to Woodlands... we should be there at approx 10am

Please mark on here if you're definitely planning on attending and also put a note of what your average training pace is too so we can make sure no-one runs alone!

Thanks, Martin

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: An Informal 20 Miler (with 10 mile options)...
